title: luvamia Mom Jeans for Women Trendy High Waisted Stretchy Loose Jeans for Women Denim Pants
description: Loose jeans, relaxed-fit boyfriend jeans with soft stretchy denim fabric, straight leg fit, cuffed hem, button and zip fly closure. Designed to enhance your figure with the perfect fit.
Cotton womens jeans, balloon tapered jeans for women, classic five pockets, optional roll-up cuff style. You can’t go wrong with the relaxed fit and perfectly design!
Loose stretchy jeans for women, casual loose jean pants. Go well with basic top, tank top, tunic top, shirt blouse for a casual look in spring, summer fall and winter.
Women pants, a perfect choice for your daily wear, casual, date, school, outdoor, club, vacation, party, ect.

Boyfriend jeans high waisted run standard US sizes, size small fits size 4 - size 6, size medium fits size 8 - size 10, size large fits size 12 - size 14, size x-large fits size 16 - size 18, size xx-large fits size 20 - size 22.
